sentences.sContent: The Prime Minister seems to be trying to rehabilitate the former defence secretary.
sentences.sCn: 首相似乎在努力为前国防大臣恢复名誉。

synos.tran: 使康复；使恢复名誉；使恢复原状
复兴；复权；恢复正常生活

remMethod.val: re(再， 又) + hab(拥有) + ilit + ate → 重新拥有 → 使恢复原状， 修复

trans.tranCn: 使恢复原状， 修复； 改造， 使恢复正常生活； 恢复…的名誉
trans.tranOther: to make people think that someone or something is good again after a period when people had a bad opinion of them
